segments.text: Nick , it's very nice of you to see me off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're welcome . Did you have a good time on this vacation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well . If I leave I'll miss you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too . Please write to me as soon as you get Boston .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure and I remembered your phone number . I'll call you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have a nice journey ! Do give my regards to your parents .
segments.speaker: S2
